DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study objective compare radiographic evaluation 3 year follow-up immediate load implant-prosthetic rehabilitation , carry randomly use methodology computer guide implant planning software polyvalent free hand implant placement .
DOC.criteria: Edentulous patient adequate area : least two teeth posterior area Age 18 year Adequate width bone crest without need bone regeneration Consensus participate oral hygiene maintenance program Consensus participate longterm study Availability provide free inform consensus . Systemic disease preclude participation study History radiation therapy Bone lesion Cigarette smoking ( 10 cigarette per day ) Inadequate oral hygiene Untreated periodontitis affect residual teeth
